name: Hertz Accessibility Services
description: Free hand controls and accessibility equipment with car rental
fullDescription: Hertz offers hand controls, spinner knobs, and accessible parking services to customers with disabilities at no additional charge.
whatTheyOffer:
- Hand controls at no extra charge
- Spinner knobs
- Accessible parking services
- Portable hand controls available
- Some restrictions on vehicle types
- Available at participating locations
howToGetIt:
1. Call Hertz: 1-800-654-3131
2. Request adaptive equipment when booking
3. Provide at least 24-48 hours notice
4. Confirm equipment availability at pickup location
5. Equipment provided at no additional cost
keywords: Hertz, car rental, hand controls, disability, accessible vehicle, mobility, adaptive equipment
